channel.title: Can a stolen ipod nano be traced/tracked by the police, apple company, etc.?
channel.description: I need to know. Does anyone know?

item.title: Can a stolen ipod nano be traced/tracked by the police, apple company, etc.?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

rip4d:

It may be possible if it has the FM Radio, but I somewhat doubt it. Nanos can’t connect to WiFi.

do you have a nano 5g? i have one of those too. I’ll look around for you

EDIT: coulda done this but i guess it’s too late http://www.associatedcontent.com/article/700591/how_to_track_a_stolen_ipod.html?cat=15

Read full topic
item.source: Can a stolen ipod nano be traced/tracked by the police, apple company, etc.?

item.title: Can a stolen ipod nano be traced/tracked by the police, apple company, etc.?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

you could’ve installed a wifi tacing app that sends instant wifi to your ipod when you pass a free wifi area. If you jail broke it i think there’s one out there like that, idk my brother is the one with the I touch, I-got a desktop.

Read full topic

item.title: Can a stolen ipod nano be traced/tracked by the police, apple company, etc.?
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

Yes it can. Well if you are using it on wifi.

I have no proof of my answer but wish merchandise so expensive I have money on it that they got a chip in it or something lol.

@offtopic< Also do u wna work on a project with me? I’ve been working off a delta. Looking good:)
